name: AR Basketball
description:
Shoot Hoops in Augmented Reality!

Grab your basketball and test your skills in this unique AR experience! This game is challenging, so no complaining from N00bz plz..

Either place the net yourself , or the game will place the net for you, but the game has one more feature that is pretty exciting:

- ARKit enabled Augmented Reality
- Haptic Feedback
- Precision Controls
- Premium Quality
- High Quality Graphics
- It's LIT

Let us know what you think on Instagram or Facebook @mintahgames

NOTE: This Game is for AR-Kit compatible devices only! For the best experience use an iPhone 7 or your shiny new iPhone X
